sense.def:
Kadar snov
adheres to a surface or object
se oprime površine ali predmeta.

seg.quote: This helps the plaster to adhere to the wall.

sense.def:
To adhere to a rule or agreement
pomeni ravnati tako, kot določa pravilo ali dogovor.

seg.quote: The fire regulations have been adhered to.

sense.def:
To adhere to an opinion or belief
pomeni podpirati neko mnenje ali prepričanje.

seg.quote: She has adhered to the view that it is my responsibility.
